title: Is there a support who can heal everyone around him/her?
body:
Okay I come from Heroes of the Storm and Overwatch and was wondering is there a Lucio character? Lucio heals everyone around him but only for a little bit of health? And are there any supports who just heal a ton? I tried Sorka but I kept dying because my heal hurts me and someone on the other team just flanked and 1 shoted me.
Thanks, LelsersLasers

replies.body:
Awk and Cheini are pretty spot on with their assessments. Those are pretty much the support champions that excel at healing others. As a note with Soraka, it's important to be good with positioning with her for all of the things you mentioned. The last thing you want is to get flanked from the side or have someone charge at you while you're trying to top off an ally with a heal. 

Luckily, she has a spell that is good at zoning off enemies who rather not get snared or silenced. It's not only until you are Level 6 that you get a pretty powerful global heal that's a pain in the neck for Karthus (who has a global damage dealing spell, Requiem).

Lastly, if you're finding yourself near death a lot as Soraka while you're healing, remember that your Q will heal you if it hits an enemy champion; it's her way of sustaining herself since she takes damage when utilizing an essential part of her kit.

One champ that wasn't mentioned yet is {{champion:44}} Taric! His Q heals everyone standing near him, only for a bit, but he can collect stacks of it and thereby empower his heal. Also his W (which is a shield) can be used on an ally to make a bond with said ally and whenever Taric uses his heal, the bonded champion will also be healed and everyone around this champion aswell

the "enchanter" supports are **Soraka, Nami, Janna; Lulu, Ivern, Karma** (these three have no heals save for redemption and are played as pure dps as well)**, Bard**; then Nidalee/old Kayle/Lux/.. they are much like disc priests (you know, yeah heal but best cc is death right?), from there on there are champions with def cds that can off-heal or just help the team in some way - like Zilean time wraps, can heal with Aery and Athene's grail (the 100% akin atonement item, but only for magic damage) or Morgana & new Kayle, Thresh, etc - there are constant arguments who of these  is enchanter and not but don't bother. xd

thing is.. usually no one defends the healers, and they should be focused asap by anyone on the enemy team. you know what happens if LK decides to attack a holy priest right? :d now i have tanked HoF bosses as shadow but..

and it is worst with Soraka {{champion:16}} - slow and silence that is half the time bugging out..
and Sona {{champion:37}} - 1.5 sec stun _ult!_ and a slow if you have cd
btw, Ali {{champion:12}} is an odd case if you like going off the rules, yet his heal works only when you are ahead (on champion kill), or after killing several minons. Aaaand don't count on him unless you are in a getting hard-flamed mood.. xdd

 
Nami {{champion:267}} has a bubble stun (once you meet a _certain champion mains_ {{champion:157}} - suspend so he can R) and a wave (and a small speed buff),
gl catching Janna {{champion:40}} (and tornado/knock-back),
Rakan {{champion:497}}  - 1,000 (3 per cd) dashes and charm - he is not mainly a healer though,
Bard {{champion:432}} - stun and wall path (+stasis),
Nidalee {{champion:76}} has 5 sec cd dash (am y she can be a disc healer because of her E att speed buff and the traps charge athene even without high dmg)
Ivern {{champion:427}} has Daisy and bushes (yet is not much of a healer either)

and still, if they are focused... rip.. (save for Bard) and once their cds are popped in a teamfight, it is all up to the team :p

 
yet.. none of them is on par with Soraka, and Sona can just do _too many_ things - ranging from assassin, healer/shielder (not for too much btw), speed/slow, feed, steal drakes (if she goes full ap, late game she can deal 526 + 158% ap which is like 2k magic damage - maybe more in an instant, without accounting R as it doesn't damage monsters)..

 
so if you want a pure healer just play as Soraka, buy zhonya if they have a phys assassin like Zed after you get your first heal power item (redemption or ardent censer usually - 2.5 sec immune so how about _no!_) and hope your team would protect you properly... and keep yourself at like 50-60% hp unless you are about to R or rede anyway :p
